answers.answer: Yep! I had it with my first but not with my second. It ***** but when you can control it its worth it. My girl came out 6lbs 7.9oz. Nice and small! So it made it worth it. Once you get the hang of it it isn't so bad. Fill up on meat and green veggies and limit everything else. Going out to eat is harder but any place that has a burger you can get it without the bun and voila! A diabetes meal.
S u c k s.... wow. Really didn't think that would get crossed out.

Yepp I have it too though we already knew there was a high chance for me to have it because so many people have diabetes in my family. I started eating healthy though I still eat some junk food and my baby is right on track for how much she is supposed to weigh. Don't worry it happens atleast now you know and can help yourself and your baby.

question: So i was told i got it and i need to diet the rest of my pregnancy so iam but im only 29 weeks and my lil girl is 3lbs 5oz so they say so bow im kinda of scared im going to have a bigger baby at birth again any of you moms got gestational diabetes
title: gestasional dibetes
